TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract WebClientProtocol extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class WebClientProtocol Inherits Component
public ref class WebClientProtocol abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定使用 ASP.NET 创建的所有 XML Web services 客户端代理的基类。

span.span: Specifies the base class for all XML Web service client proxies created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性类用于控制用于传输的 XML Web 服务请求和响应的传输行为。The properties of the class are used to control the behavior of the transport used to transmit the XML Web service request and response. 此类的属性将映射到属性上找到。The properties on this class map to properties found on . 从派生类的实例，如，作为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的传输机制使用。Instances of classes deriving from , such as , are used as the transport mechanism for XML Web services created using ASP.NET. 若要与 XML Web 服务进行通信，必须创建代理类间接或直接派生自你想要调用 XML Web 服务。To communicate with an XML Web service, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service you want to call. 而不是手动创建代理类，可以使用 Wsdl.exe 工具创建代理类为给定的 XML Web 服务的服务说明。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 由于类的基类为客户端代理，您将在代理类中找到其属性。Since is the base class for your client proxy, you will find its properties on your proxy classes. 这些属性可用于控制基础传输的请求行为。These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport. 例如，使用属性的调用进行身份验证的 XML Web services。For instance, use the property for calling authenticated XML Web services. 许多属性用于初始化用于发出 Web 请求的对象。Many of the properties are used to initialize the object that is used to make the Web request. ## Examples 下面的示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体设置代理信息和客户端凭据之前调用远程 XML Web 服务方法的代理类。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form sets proxy information and client credentials on the proxy class prior to calling the remote XML Web service method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类的属性复制到的新实例为每个 XML Web 服务方法调用的对象。

span.span: The properties on this class are copied into a new instance of a object for each XML Web service method call.

threadsafe.span: 虽然你可以在同一个调用 XML Web 服务方法实例同时在不同的线程，从没有同步可确保一致的快照的属性将被传送至对象。

span.span: While you can call XML Web service methods on the same instance from different threads at the same time, there is no synchronization done to ensure that a consistent snapshot of the properties will get transferred to the object.

threadsafe.span: 因此如果您需要修改属性并进行并发的方法调用来自不同线程应使用不同的实例的 XML Web 服务代理，或提供你自己的同步。

span.span: Therefore if you need to modify the properties and make concurrent method calls from different threads you should use a different instance of the XML Web service proxy or provide your own synchronization.

The name of the connection group.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够将请求到连接组相关联。The property enables you to associate a request to a connection group. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 。For more details, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 客户端身份验证的安全凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets security credentials for XML Web service client authentication.

value.span: XML Web services 客户端的 。

span.span: The for the XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时`Credentials`属性，XML Web 服务客户端必须实例化类实现，如，然后设置客户端凭据特定于身份验证机制。When using the `Credentials` property, a XML Web service client must instantiate a class implementing , such as , and then set the client credentials specific to the authentication mechanism. 类可用于设置身份验证凭据使用基本、 摘要式、 NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证机制。The class can be used to set authentication credentials using the basic, digest, NTLM and Kerberos authentication mechanisms. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则客户端将与服务器进行协商，并根据服务器的配置方式执行 Kerberos 和/或 NTLM 身份验证。When the property is set to then the client negotiates with the server to do Kerberos and/or NTLM authentication depending on how the server is configured. ## Examples 下面的示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 内`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体显式设置的身份验证凭据`Credentials`属性。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets authentication credentials using the `Credentials` property. 向构造函数中传递的用户名、 密码和域类。The user name, password and domain are passed into the constructor for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅：For more information, see. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 这一受保护的方法由 XML Web services 客户端基础结构调用来获取新的 传输对象，以传输 XML Web services 请求。

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get a new transport object to transmit the XML Web service request.
The instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以重写此方法以自定义对象，然后才能进行 XML Web 服务请求。This method can be overridden to customize the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如无法将自定义标头添加到请求。For example you could add a custom header to the request.

span.span: The parameter is .

span.span: Returns a response from a request to an XML Web service method.

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get the response from a synchronous XML Web service request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreAuthenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreAuthenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置是否启用了预身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets whether pre-authentication is enabled.

value.span: 若要对请求进行预身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to pre-authenticate the request; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端请求资源时不使用凭据的情况下时，服务器质询请求，并指示它支持哪些身份验证方案。When a client requests a resource without using credentials, the server challenges the request and indicates what authentication schemes it supports. 客户端选择的身份验证方案，并将发送相应`WWW-authenticate`到服务器的标头。The client chooses an authentication scheme and sends the appropriate `WWW-authenticate` header to the server. 当是`true`，则`WWW-authenticate`标头发送的所有后续请求使用。When is `true`, the `WWW-authenticate` header is sent with all subsequent requests. 当是`false`，而无需最初尝试对用户进行身份验证向 XML Web 服务方法发出请求。When is `false`, a request is made to the XML Web service method without initially attempting to authenticate the user. 如果 XML Web 服务允许匿名访问，则执行 XML Web 服务方法。If the XML Web service allows anonymous access, then the XML Web service method is executed. 如果不允许匿名访问，401 HTTP 返回代码发送回客户端。If anonymous access is disallowed, a 401 HTTP return code is sent back to the client. 在响应中，类返回到 Web 服务器的身份验证凭据。In response, the class returns authentication credentials to the Web server. 如果客户端进行身份验证和随后有权访问 XML Web 服务，则执行 XML Web 服务方法;否则客户端被拒绝访问。If the client is authenticated and subsequently authorized to access the XML Web service, the XML Web service method is executed; otherwise the client is denied access.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ RequestEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };
member this.RequestEncoding : System.Text.Encoding with get, set

summary.span: 用于对 XML Web services 发出客户端请求的 。

span.span: The used to make the client request to the XML Web service.

value.span: 客户端请求的字符编码。

span.span: The character encoding for the client request.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它将默认编码用于基础传输和协议。

span.span: The default is , which uses the default encoding for the underlying transport and protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定的请求消息的编码。The determines the encoding for the request message. 的请求将使用进行批注的编码值。The of the request will be annotated with the encoding value. 类派生自支持特定的协议，如does 对于 SOAP，设置此属性，以符合特定协议的编码要求。Classes deriving from support a particular protocol, such as does for SOAP, set this property to conform to encoding requirements for the specific protocol. 例如，设置为 utf-8 的默认编码。For example, the sets the default encoding to UTF-8. ## Examples 下面的示例是名为 XML Web 服务调用一个 ASP.NET Web 窗体`Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数中，Web 窗体显式设置 RequestEncoding 为 utf-8。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets RequestEncoding to UTF-8. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 指示 XML Web services 客户端等待同步 XML Web services 请求完成的时间（以毫秒计）的回复。

span.span: Indicates the time an XML Web service client waits for the reply to a synchronous XML Web service request to arrive (in milliseconds).

value.span: 对 XML Web services 的同步调用的超时（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The time out, in milliseconds, for synchronous calls to the XML Web service.
The default is 100000 milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为指示请求不会超时。即使 XML Web 服务客户端可以设置属性设置为不会超时，Web 服务器仍然可能导致在服务器端的请求超时。Setting the property to indicates that the request does not time out. Even though an XML Web service client can set the property to not time out, the Web server can still cause the request to time out on the server side. ## Examples 下面的示例设置`Timeout`值为 15000 （15 秒） 为同步调用`Add`中的 XML Web 服务方法`Math`XML Web 服务。The following example sets the `Timeout` value to 15000 (15 seconds) for the synchronous call to the `Add` XML Web service method within the `Math` XML Web service. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 的基 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.

value.span: 客户端正在请求的 XML Web services 的基 URL。

span.span: The base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Wsdl.exe 生成的代理类将设置默认的客户端使用的属性。Proxy classes generated using Wsdl.exe will set a default property for the client to use. 默认值由从中生成代理类的服务说明中找到的位置属性。The default is determined by the location attribute found in the service description from which the proxy class was generated. 派生类支持特定的协议，如并可能会添加到的额外信息以使 XML Web 服务请求。Derived classes supporting specific protocols, such as and might add extra information to to make the XML Web service request. 可以更改属性来实现相同的服务说明从生成代理类的任何 XML Web 服务引用。The property can be changed to refer to any XML Web service that implements the same service description that the proxy class was generated from. ## Examples 下面的示例更改属性`math`XML Web 服务的 Web 服务器名为目标`http:// www.contoso.com`。The following example changes the property for the `math` XML Web service to the Web server named `http:// www.contoso.com`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
